subject: AI & Agents
title: Boston Dynamics Atlas: Robots That Move Like Humans
description: A micro-lesson that makes Boston Dynamics Atlas: Robots That Move Like Humans usable.

hook.text: A humanoid robot does a backflip, runs through an obstacle course, and catches its balance on ice.

buildup.text: Atlas combines advanced robotics with AI-powered balance, perception, and movement planning.

discovery.text: Reinforcement learning lets it adapt to terrain it's never seen â€” adjusting gait in real time.

twist.text: Atlas is a research platform, not a product. Practical humanoid robots are still limited.

climax.text: The new electric Atlas and competitors like Figure 01 are designed for real-world warehouse work.

punchline.text: The robot learned to fall. Then it learned to get back up.
